casebody.data:
Peter Mager, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided May 2, 1892. Appeal by defendants from judgment entered upon the report of a referee in favor of plaintiff. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Sackett & Bennett, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and McAdam, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment with costs.
